section.name: DataNucleus Access Platform 2.1.4 Released
section.p: December 18th 2010- DataNucleus Access Platform 2.1.4 ("Thomson") is released. DataNucleus Access Platform provides persistence and retrieval of Java objects to/from a wide range of datastores including RDBMS, db4o, LDAP, XML, and Excel. Version 2.1.4 includes the following changes over 2.1.3

ul.li: Fix to bug in determination of inheritance level of application identity object
Fix couple of places where code not thread-safe
JPA : Support for fetch groups (DataNucleus extension)
JPA : few minor corrections to JPA2 handling

section.p: This release is downloadable under an Apache 2 license from the DataNucleus community site.
